intro: The walruses stole your eggs. Time to get them back! Run, jump, and stomp your way through 17 vibrant levels in this fast-paced, family-friendly platformer.
description:
The walruses stole your eggs. Time to get them back! Explore the 17 vibrant levels in this fast-paced, family-friendly platformer.

Waddle fast. Jump high. Save your eggs.

The evil walruses have stolen your precious eggs—and Mama Penguin isn’t having it. Dash, dive, and double-jump your way through 17 action-packed levels in Penguin Panic, a charming retro-style platformer full of surprises, secret challenges, and slippery foes!

Inspired by classics like Penguin Adventure on the MSX, Penguin Panic brings retro 2D platformer fun with modern polish. Whether you're bouncing off walrus heads, collecting tasty fish, or racing against the clock, every level is a colorful, fast-paced adventure.

Features

- 17 hand-crafted levels across icy tundras, grassy fields, scorching deserts, and snowy peaks
- Easy controls, satisfying platforming, and loads of hidden secrets
 - No violence, no ads—just pure, penguin-powered fun
- Perfect for kids, nostalgic grownups, and anyone who says “noot noot” unironically
- Made by the award-winning creators of Avalon and Online Soccer Manager (OSM)

Do you have what it takes to outwit the walruses and save your family? Slide into action and find out!
